DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study of patients treated with bimatoprost 0.03% (Latisse®) for at least 12 months for hypotrichosis of the eyelashes.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Patients Treated With Bimatoprost 0.03% (Latisse®) for Hypotrichosis of the Eyelashes
DOC.criteria: Hypotrichosis of the eyelashes Using bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.03% (Latisse®) for at least 12 months Use of any overthecounter medication(s) for eyelash growth
